item.title: Towards the Transferability of Rewards Recovered via Regularized Inverse Reinforcement Learning
item.description: This paper proposes a novel solution to the transferability problem in inverse reinforcement learning (IRL) using principal angles to measure the similarity between transition laws. It provides suffi…
